## Impact Assessment

### Affected Components

- [ ] **Training Pipeline** - Model training scripts, feature engineering
- [ ] **Inference Pipeline** - Prediction generation, live feature extraction
- [ ] **Data Pipeline** - Fetchers, loaders, database operations
- [ ] **Models** - Model architecture, saved model files
- [ ] **Configuration** - Environment variables, settings files
- [ ] **Documentation** - README, CLAUDE.md, inline docs

- [ ] Medium (1-3 days)
